name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Staff Engineer with 13+ years of comprehensive experience in building scalable APIs and optimizing performance for high-performance applications in the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in **Ruby on Rails**, **Python**, **TypeScript**, and **AI/ML technologies**, with direct experience in both frontend and backend development using **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Flutter**, **React**, **Next.js**, and **Node.js**. 
Demonstrated expertise in developing AI-powered solutions that leverage **Knowledge Graphs** and **AI Gateways** for advanced analytics and automation, ensuring alignment with regulatory standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. Skilled in database design and distributed systems, with a strong foundation in mentoring technical teams and facilitating effective communication and collaboration. Acknowledged for contributions in deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**, utilizing microservices and event-driven architectures, all while maintaining robust CI/CD pipelines.

experience.responsibilities:
Developed scalable APIs using **Python** and **Ruby on Rails**, ensuring high performance and compliance with industry standards.
Led performance optimization efforts for applications, leveraging **AI/ML technologies** to enhance data processing and decision-making capabilities.
Designed and executed database architectures, ensuring robust data design principles in support of both healthcare and fintech operations.
Mentored technical teams in best practices related to **Rust**, facilitating knowledge sharing and fostering a collaborative environment.
Implemented distributed systems strategies, enabling fault-tolerant applications with effective resource management and scalability.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to integrate **Knowledge Graph** and **Language Server** capabilities, enhancing application intelligence and user experience.
Delivered technical presentations to stakeholders, demonstrating project progress and aligning development with business needs.
Optimized application performance through rigorous analysis and proactive troubleshooting, achieving improvements measured by a **30% reduction in response time**.
Enhanced communication skills by facilitating workshops and team meetings focused on project alignment and collaboration across departments.
Guided project planning efforts, ensuring timely delivery of features with a **100% success rate on delivery deadlines** in the last **12 months**.

• Developed and optimized scalable APIs using **Python** and **Ruby on Rails** to enhance financial platform capabilities, achieving a **30%** increase in response times.
• Leveraged **AI/ML technologies** and frameworks such as **scikit-learn** and **XGBoost** to implement advanced machine learning models for tasks like fraud detection, resulting in a **25%** reduction in false positives.
• Collaborated across teams, utilizing strong communication skills to facilitate discussions on architecture design and technical mentorship in distributed systems development.
• Architected and implemented robust and efficient database designs, improving data retrieval times by up to **40%** through effective indexing strategies and query optimization.
• Engaged in performance optimization initiatives, regularly monitoring system metrics and conducting code reviews to ensure high-quality deliverables.
• Designed and deployed **event-driven architectures** and message brokers such as **Kafka** and **RabbitMQ**, enhancing system scalability and reliability for operational workflows.
• Spearheaded the integration of **AI Gateway** capabilities, facilitating seamless access to machine learning models across multiple applications.
• Fostered collaboration within teams to create a **Knowledge Graph** that enhanced data relationships and insights used in decision-making processes, improving analytical outcomes by **15%**.

Engineered scalable APIs and optimized backend services for a global e-commerce platform leveraging **Ruby on Rails**, **Python (FastAPI, Django)**, and **Node.js (NestJS, Express)**, ensuring high availability, low latency, and robust performance across critical modules, such as checkout and order fulfillment.
Developed intelligent AI/ML technologies integrated into applications, utilizing scikit-learn, LightGBM, and TensorFlow, to enhance product listings and improve conversion rates with real-time behavior analysis that led to a **20% increase** in user engagement.
Implemented performance optimization strategies, harnessing **MongoDB**, **PostgreSQL**, and **Redis** for distributed data access, which resulted in **30% faster** response times for high-traffic e-commerce workflows.
Mentored team members on best practices for database design and scalable system architecture, fostering an environment of technical growth and collaborative problem-solving.
Created and maintained applications using **TypeScript**, **React (18)**, and **Vue 3**, ensuring a high-quality user experience across both web and mobile platforms.
Enhanced application responsiveness and data access efficiency by implementing Redis caching for shopping cart sessions and product metadata, achieving a **40% reduction** in database load during peak hours.
Collaborated effectively with cross-functional teams to implement controlled feature rollouts using **LaunchDarkly** and **Kubernetes**, enabling A/B testing and minimizing deployment risks.
Designed functionalities with a focus on language server integrations and automated workflows, streamlining processes aligned with user needs and platform goals.
Ensured compliance with data protection regulations, applying RBAC and **OAuth 2.0** for secure user access, thereby safeguarding sensitive information and maintaining GDPR standards.
Communicated technical concepts clearly to team members and stakeholders, facilitating efficient collaboration within the software development lifecycle.
